press_enter_to_confirm: Press Enter to confirm or Esc to cancel
selected_entities_hint: Selected {count, plural, one {# entity} other {# entities}}
project.name: Name
project.import.text: Click or drag file to this area to upload
project.import.hint: A JSON file in {title} format
project.export.hint: Export to a JSON in {title} format

project_form.name_extra: A unique name to identify this project.
project_form.remark_extra: An optional arbitrary remark of this project.
project_form.specification_extra: An optional additional specification of the project. Check the doc for more details.

error.invalid_project_spec_json: The project specification is malformed. Check here for its schema.

project_form.manual_import_extra: Download the data to manually import through command line. Recommended for situations like when the nutsh server is behind some proxy with request body size limit or the memory of the host machine running nutsh client is not sufficient.

import_data_ready_extra: Download the data and follow the further instruction to import through command line.
project_empty_spec_hint: This project is not configured with any specification.
video.name: Name

video_form.name_extra: A unique name to identify this video.
video_form.frame_extra: A multiline text with each line being the URL of the corresponding frame in JPEG or PNG format.

empty_project_hint: This project has no resources yet.
download_completed_successfully.message: Run following command from terminal in the download destination folder to import the project.
overwrite_tuning_hint: Tuned masks will always overwrite existing ones.
mask_unsaved_message: The modification is not confirmed. Press Enter to confirm or Esc to disgard.
click_the_target_entity: Click the target entity to transfer
click_the_target_component_to_interpolat: Click the target component between which to interpolate

online_segmentation.embedding_remark: It may take a while depending on the computability of the server.
online_segmentation.embed_failed_remark: Please check the server log for error details

menu.auto_track_unapplicable_last_slice: Can not auto tracking objects on the last slice
menu.selected_entities_title: Selected {count, plural, one {{count} entity} other {{count} entities}}

warn.disable_polyline_first_vertex_bezier: Can not turn the first vertex of a polyline into bezier.
warn.can_only_interpolate_beteween_component_: Can only interpolate between two components of the same type.
warn.can_only_interpolate_across_frames: Can only interpolate across at least three frames.
warn.it_is_the_only_component_of_its_entity: It is the only component of its entity
warn.delete_hovering_component: This component will be deleted. All other components of this entity will remain unaffected.
warn.delete_selected_entities_in_current_fram: All components of the selected {count, plural, one {{count} entity} other {{count} entities}} will be removed from this frame. {count, plural, one {Its} other {Their}} components in other frames are untouched.
warn.delete_selected_entities: The selected {count, plural, one {{count} entity} other {{count} entities}} will be removed completely.

error.project.import.mismatch_vertices_t: Some polygon has unequal vertices and types length
error.project.import.invalid_vertex_type: Some polygon has invalid vertex type
error.project.import.invalid_surrounding: Some polygon has invalid surrounding vertex type
error.project.import.vertex_unexpected_t: Some polygon has vertex of unexpected type
error.sync: Failed to sync with the server
error.sync.conflict: The client and server have conflicting annotations, which may due to multiple annotators working on the same video simultaneously or poor network. Please refresh the page.
error.import_project_oom_message: The import data is too large. You can download the data and import through command line manually.
error.ErrUniqueFieldConflict.videos.name: Video name already exists
